goals__remit: ZF is a global leader in driveline and chassis technology as well as active and passive safety technology. The combined company reported sales of €35 billion in 2017 and now has a global workforce of around 136,000 with approximately 230 locations in some 40 countries. ZF annually invests approximately five percent of its sales in Research & Development (€2 billion in 2017) ensuring continued success through the design and engineering of innovative technologies.
